subject: Order # SSN2726
description_text:
Hey I still have not received the haptic reactors that I ordered. Is there
an issue with the order? When should I expect them?

conversations.body_text: Hi Matt Kornelsen,    I note that your parcel has indeed encountered a delivery anomaly. We shall investigate the cause immediately, please do not worry.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045932239066
